sumireko:Lemegeton.NAME: Lemegeton
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, replace it with a random card. The cost remains the same.

sumireko:SeaCrystal.NAME: Sea Crystal
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw until your hand is full. At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP for each card in your hand.

sumireko:FuturisticGrimoire.NAME: Futuristic Grimoire
sumireko:FuturisticGrimoire.FLAVOR: Isn't this yours? Though, it looks a bit different.

sumireko:OccultBall.NAME: Occult Ball
sumireko:OccultBall.FLAVOR: A mystical object, said to grant wishes... well, it's really not that powerful.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of every third turn, make a card in your hand #ysumireko:Occult for the rest of combat.

sumireko:BetterOccultBall.NAME: Occult Ball?
sumireko:BetterOccultBall.FLAVOR: A mystical object, said to grant wishes... well, it's really not that powerful.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, make 3 cards in your hand #ysumireko:Occult for the rest of combat.
